data.name: Scarlet
data.description:
Scarlet Crusade

Units:
+2 armor
-5% evasion

Buildings:
+300 Tower and Keep range
200 minimum Tower and Keep range

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Magic:
Inner Fire (+10% damage to 1 unit)
Purging Fire (125 damage in 200 AoE)
Resurrection (revives 1 unit)

Traits: Trained profesional army with unyealding mentality. Experts of healing magic and defensive tactics. Will hold the line to the last man beyond any limits in order to PURGE ALL XENO SCUM.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Hypersense Aura
auras.description:
Reveals entire map
Reveals invisible units
(10000 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Righteous Zeal Aura
auras.description:
20% melee lifesteal
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Repulse Aura
auras.description:
45 damage return shield
+4 base armor
(affects your buildings only)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Templar Order [Q]
bonuses.description:
Reduces spell damage to Zealot, Crossbowman, Acolyte, Banner Bearer and Light Cavalry by 15%. In addition, Zealot and Light Cavalry attacks burn 8/16/24/32 mana.
(burns half amount to Heroes)
(can be upgraded in this building)

Type: Anti Magic Damage

upgrades.name: Templar Swords
upgrades.description:
Gives:
8 mana burn
(4 mana to Heroes)

bonuses.name: Sentry [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Hold the Line

Sentry replaces Zealot
Melee Unit
-20% attack rate
+4 damage
+50 HP
Abilities:
Long Weapon (Passive Skill)
(30% to do 2x damage)
(affects strong creeps only)
Cleaving Attack (Passive Skill)
(20% damage in 150 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Steel Swords
Steel Armor
Undying Will
Hold the Line

Type: Anti Heavy Creeps

bonuses.name: Arcane Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Arcane Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

(does not affect Special unit)

spells.description:
-1.5 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero

spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

spells.description:

towerUpgrades.name: Undying Will
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 50 armor and 50 HP/s when low HP
Affects: Zealot and Bannerman

Lv1: 20% chance for 4 sec
Lv2: 25% chance for 5 sec
Lv3: 30% chance for 6 sec
Lv4: 35% chance for 7 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Hold the Line
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor to other units in 125 AoE
Affects: Zealot and Crossbowman
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: +3 armor
Lv2: +6 armor
Lv3: +9 armor
Lv4: +12 armor

towerUpgrades.name: Incinerating Arrows
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to splash fire
Affects: Crossbowman
(splashes in 175 AoE for 10 sec)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 10%, -2 armor, 5 damage/sec
Lv2: 20%, -4 armor, 10 damage/sec
Lv3: 30%, -6 armor, 15 damage/sec
Lv4: 40%, -8 armor, 20 damage/sec

towerUpgrades.name: Advanced Ballistics
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate and range
Affects: Crossbowman and Ballista

Lv1: +5% attack rate, +50 range
Lv2: +10% attack rate, +100 range
Lv3: +15% attack rate, +150 range
Lv4: +20% attack rate, +200 range

towerUpgrades.name: Swooping Attack
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and splash
Affects: Holy Cavalry
(splash damage in 200 AoE)

Lv1: +8 damage, 15% cleaving attack
Lv2: +16 damage, 25% cleaving attack
Lv3: +24 damage, 35% cleaving attack
Lv4: +32 damage, 45% cleaving attack

Gives: hit points and armor
Affects: Light Cavalry and Holy Cavalry

Lv1: +25 hit points, +2 armor
Lv2: +50 hit points, +4 armor
Lv3: +75 hit points, +6 armor
Lv4: +100 hit points, +8 armor

towerUpgrades.name: Deadly Shot
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to kill instantly
Affects: Ballista and Ballista Tower
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 10% to kill instantly
Lv2: 20% to kill instantly
Lv3: 30% to kill instantly
Lv4: 40% to kill instantly

towerUpgrades.name: Holy Surge
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: healing and attack range
Affects: Acolyte

Lv1: heals 60 HP, +25 range
Lv2: heals 100 HP, +50 range
Lv3: heals 140 HP, +75 range
Lv4: heals 180 HP, +100 range

towerUpgrades.name: Banner of Crusade
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in every 2nd wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Scarlet Aegis (bonus armor)
+3/+5/+7/+9 armor in 600 AoE
Lv2: has Righteous Sacrifice (heal on death)
15 HP/s for 7/8/9 sec in 600 AoE
Lv3: has Endurance Aura (bonus speed)
+15%/+20% attack rate in 500 AoE
Lv4: has Masss Cleanse (dispel buffs)
dispels buffs in 300 AoE
(200 damage to summoned units)

(affects organic units only)
